long_description: The Born Cita shoes combine the stylish details of boots with the lightweight coverage of shoes-they're great for under jeans or paired with a cool-weather dress or skirt. Leather uppers offer flexible, durable support and structure; slip-on style allows easy on/off. Shearling linings provide breathable warmth. EVA insoles deliver cushioning; steel shanks add excellent support for long days of standing or walking. Born Cita shoes feature 1.5 in. heels; rubber outsoles provide reliable traction. Closeout.
